overview:
Chris Stokes is called “The Hundred Million Dollar Man.”

He has been involved in the music business since he was 17, and started his career by managing artists like Omarion and Marques Houston under his label. He is known for the role he played in launching his artists to multi-platinum stardom.

Chris is a director, with over 150 music videos and 6 feature films to his name. His feature film directing debut, “You Got Served,” grossed more than $150 million in ticket and DVD sales, and stayed at the top of the charts even on its second week. He is the Chairman of Brown & Barrett, his own film company.
